card_text: Each of your opponent's monsters in the same column as one of your "S-Force" monsters loses 600 ATK. If this card is Normal or Special Summoned: You can target 1 of your banished "S-Force" monsters, except "S-Force Pla-Tina"; Special Summon it. You can only use this effect of "S-Force Pla-Tina" once per turn.
